author: saifulanwar
title: The @Blocktrades World Cup 2018 Penalty Shot, England Will Win?
body:
<center>![19.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdE4zgRDMi6x6cyg7UeExRWH9FfDnJyE34QGifxrSXLiC/19.jpg)</center>


England finally managed to treat the wounded feeling they had lost on penalties for almost 30 years when they beat Colombia 4-3 on penalties in the last 16 of the 2018 World Cup in at the Spartak Stadium, Moscow, Russia.
Previously, Gareth Southgate care team is playing a 1-1 draw against Jose Pekerman's squad until the end of extra round.

<center>![17.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNLpskufop8Qqdw6KCWnURuYT1QktTU1xCFZhNNUuMBxt/17.jpg)</center>


During this England like a traumatic match if you have to undergo penalties. In the semi-finals of the 1990 World Cup in Italy, Paul Gascoigne, Gary Lineker, and comrades lost on penalties against West Germany. England then lost three times on penalties at the World Cup. They also lost on three of the four on penalties at the European Cup.
Coach Gareth Southgate, who suffered a penalty shootout failure when he became England's European Cup player, succeeded in drawing up a new generation of Three Lions teams deserved to win again after 1966.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

In the game, a new goal created through a penalty kick from Harry Kane in the 57th minute. Colombia was only able to reply to the goal in extra time through a header from the young defender, Yerry Mina, utilizing feedback from a corner kick. The game continued with an additional round.

<center>![1607905015.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcLf8NiPcUfGjaFjghwQzQEaVkJRML8PdtxvFrKewXMfE/1607905015.jpg)</center>

However, for 30 minutes extra round took place, both teams could not score a goal. Score is still a draw, the game was continued with a penalty shootout.
Radamel Falcao, who became the first executor for Colombia, managed to break down England goalkeeper guarded by Jordan Pickford. His success was also followed by two executor next, namely Juan Cuadrado and Luis Muriel.
But on the other hand, England should be left first, after Jordan Henderson, who became the third executor for the Three Lions squad, failed to break down the goalkeeper of Colombia escorted by David Ospina. After earlier, Kane and Marcus Rashford successfully penalize the penalty.

<center>![716398_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSL3WnwvCuWwYgQTby7Sma1wA9kNNMvJv1k3BxJnkKmYe/716398_720.jpg)</center>

Luckily for England, Henderson's failure was followed by Colombia's fourth executive, Mateus Uribe. While the fourth executor from England, Kieran Trippier, successfully penalty kick.
Asa Colombia was increasingly disappeared when the last executor, Carlos Bacca, also failed to execute his penalty. Finally, the British victory was closed by a penalty kick from Eric Dier. England also won the tosan-tosan contest with a score of 4-3.

For the victory, Britain is entitled to advance to the quarter-finals by facing Sweden on Saturday night, July 7 pm in Samara Arena, Russia.

<center>![Pixiz_20180625_165630_fyfm.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRfb3hSFQwG3i5vrcQECaUujyfnnHZ2foLrG1hE9UQxr6/Pixiz_20180625_165630_fyfm.png)</center>

# The composition of English players:
Pickford; Walker (Rashford 113 '), Stones, Maguire; Henderson, Trippier, Young (Rose 102 '), Lingard, Alli (Dier 81'); Sterling (Vardy 88 '), Kane

title: World Cup 2018: Nike likes opponents with Adidas | Cuartos de Final - Haz tu post para seguir concursando por 2,000 SBD en premios
body:
<center>![716118_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXxfZxabYFSwjnDzmxwQEhF1pxA5cayp9GZicSVZ8i4dw/716118_720.jpg)</center>
Hello everyone, Producer of Nike sports equipment to temporarily "beat" their rival, Adidas, at the 2018 World Cup. Nike sponsors Brazil, England and France who qualify for the quarterfinals. All three also occupy the top three are seeded today to win the 2018 World Cup.

<center>![716120_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWoZA5PxXiGTmRYr9vpfcEaxNSch79WNMnmbDvtR2Y3WJ/716120_720.jpg)</center>

The favored ranking situation for the 2018 World Cup champion, among others, was done by the official bookmaker, William Hill. In addition to them, the sports manufacturers from the United States also sponsored another quarter-final team, Croatia. German sports equipment maker Adidas sponsors Belgium, Russia and Sweden for the quarterfinals.Another team that went to the quarter-finals, Uruguay, was supported by another German sports manufacturer, Puma. On the other hand, Nike has now generated their worldwide sales of sports equipment products in excess of US $ 2 billion or around Rp 28 trillion in fiscal year 2018.

<center>![brasil.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmajmy6GTgbsxRTtYA1WckxLZupiAiJUXLyw9qXkzLtWv3/brasil.jpeg)</center>

"While Adidas dominates the European leagues and professional leagues of the United States, of course any market share that Nike can take in non-traditional American sports can be a good sign for pricing and stock brands," said Jake Dollarhide, CEO of Longbow Asset Management in Tulsa, Oklahoma.

<center>![l.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNr98CuoBhiCMXBefAqLygQwDnDksQB4KzDwPvderFEpo/l.jpg)</center>

Sports brand manufacturers usually sell most of their merchandise to their fans ahead of the World Cup. However, the success of the team in the field can result in additional demand for decorated and decorated gear from the winning costume. This, especially if the progress is unexpected.

<center>![r.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYbgwKUGb5x8sJzWeBTos5fcVJEiYN1h7GY28wihEZKVa/r.jpg)</center>

Nike is sponsoring more team fixtures than Adidas for the first time at the 2014 World Cup in Brazil. However, Adidas "hit" behind this year by sponsoring 12 of the 32 teams that participated in the 2018 World Cup, including defending champions Germany, Spain, and host Russia.But this tournament in Russia became difficult for Adidas after the 2014 World Cup champions, Germany, unexpectedly knocked out.

<center>![13.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbEGUXUvYVbY6tCz9xevtogkvNksZg2nEJu93PrprPBKm/13.jpg)</center>

However, the World Cup remains the biggest market opportunity for Adidas. They are one of seven partners of the world football body, FIFA, and have been suppliers of World Cup soccer since 1970.

author: saiful46
title: The @Blocktrades World Cup - last 8 | France Vs Uruguay, What's the Best Position for Kylian Mbappe?
body:
<center>![716461_720 (1).jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUAPSjTBzPWhfzurGpfKgY9FsVzXQqC5qpZF6bzdvDLns/716461_720%20(1).jpg)</center>

Hello all steemian lovers and fans of Russia's 2018 world cup, France coach Didier Deschamps prepared the best tactics to ensure Kylian Mbappe received plenty of bait in the 2018 World Cup quarter-final match against Uruguay.

<center>![p2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXn4jnfySnuPyfafbdqzZMXUSzBgQCbcVnNjyukzGPqRC/p2.jpg)</center>

Mbappe, 19, will be a major concern in the game later. The young player was already compared to Pele when he emerged as a factor X for France, having looked good and scored twice against Spain in the last 16. According to Deschamps, Mbappe needs to be given the opportunity to earn lots of balls if he wants to make an impact while playing at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.

<center>![p1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbbyo9Z42wHFze35RT5R2uSURU8RG4GEnRjpU9ufcMsWG/p1.jpg)</center>

The speed and sharpness of Mbappe has been the subject of talks at the World Cup. One observer's spotlight is how Deschamps can maximize Mbappe's role in a French-style front-liner with an attacking style.
Deschamps from the beginning understood the situation he was facing. "I can not complain that I have a player who can take an offensive position," Deschamps said earlier this year. "But I can make sure that they will be used in their best positions."

<center>![p3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcRN6fZFa2EHEmw1pNu45RTZQELSpsLtqcGrYPwbnPcnn/p3.jpg)</center>

Although many experts insist Mbappe is best used in the role of a classic center forward, Deschamps will likely play on the right side of the strike on Friday, giving Olivier Giroud a place to join Antoine Griezmann as the attacking trio.
France needed all the attacking talent they could muster, as it could damage Uruguay's defenses like "jackhammer" trying to open a new path.

<center>![p4.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaNidktyn63S7Y3T2JGErUFP9pKEMwBhqdw4Wir9HCcVq/p4.jpg)</center>

The South American team have recorded matches without conceding in six of their previous seven matches with team-mates Diego Godin and Jose Gimenez as the original wall.
Uruguay's game plan is well known. Make your defense as strong as possible for your opponent and when you get the ball, go straight to Edinson Cavani or Luis Suarez.

<center></center>

Unless, the plan can be very disturbed if Cavani does not recover from a calf injury and failed to appear on Friday.
Uruguay did the exercises earlier this week for a number of options, with Cristhian Stuani likely to play sideways and Cristian Rodriguez was asked to offer more support to Suarez, who tried to hide his weakness when Cavani missed a chance.

<center>![p5.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZMroLXqajbZ8SnynHjrTTdWmkhjD3iUGNAgo9nZim7Yt/p5.jpg)</center>

"It does not depend on the one player shown by Uruguay that we are dependent on collective work in the field.

<center>![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)</center>

author: saifulanwar
title: The @Blocktrades World Cup -  last 8 | Brazil Vs Belgium: Kompany Talks About Gold and Neymar Generation
body:
<center>![710020_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPWJ6svUX1X14ihhG9myuT6mKzjoPytJ5DtyppyAPHbbo/710020_720.jpg)</center>

Belgium defender Vincent Kompany said Wednesday that the 2018 World Cup quarter-final match against Brazil, in Kazan on Friday, was the decisive game for his team. He also insisted that the "gold generation" label affixed to his team would have no effect.

<center>![715115_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYtvPzHagt3NfUUtaUCEViJF3sMZEmv8GXeRZttAnN76Q/715115_720.jpg)</center>

"The term 'golden generation' is definitely not a term found by any of the players and it is not something that is so important to us," he said during a military exercise in Moscow.
Kompany, "The fact that the game against Brazil is decisive for our generation is uncertain, although it is not like we failed until now but there is a level above, which we need to achieve, which can be done by games like we play against Brazil.

<center>![brasil.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmajmy6GTgbsxRTtYA1WckxLZupiAiJUXLyw9qXkzLtWv3/brasil.jpeg)</center>

He said the game would be decisive, also for Brazil. "So this is a decisive game, but not just for us it is a decisive game for Brazil as well, their players have" both teams deserve to face each other deeper, in this tournament and not in the quarterfinals.
The "Golden Generation" label has been attached to Kompany and Belgian players, including Kevin De Bruyne, Eden Hazard, Thibault Courtois, and Dries Mertens, for many years. So far they have not been able to excel and were eliminated in the final round of World Cup 2014 and European Championships in France two years ago.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

Kompany says they are mentally tougher, especially as members of the squad have won at club level across Europe. "It used to be in Belgian culture, and I think people will agree with me, we will try even before a match like this, but all the players in our team, who play in clubs around the world, now believe 100 percent we can beat Brazil. 
Is that realistic enough? "I do not know, Brazil is a great team but there is no day when I sit thinking 'what if we lose'?" he says.

<center>![716120_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWoZA5PxXiGTmRYr9vpfcEaxNSch79WNMnmbDvtR2Y3WJ/716120_720.jpg)</center>

Kompany asked about the action Neymar often overreact when violated opponents. What will Belgium do?
"I do not know, I do not care," said Manchester City defender. "If it's going to be an individual reality game and that's it then you will lose us now also have no chance against Brazil but if it will be the collective look of a team that knows how to play together and fight for each other, then we have and one thing that can be done.Whatever players in other teams will not be much danger. 

<center></center>
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)

title: Uruguay Vs France, Deschamps Galau Define Successor Matuidi
body:
<center>![p3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcRN6fZFa2EHEmw1pNu45RTZQELSpsLtqcGrYPwbnPcnn/p3.jpg)</center>

Hello everyone, France coach Didier Deschamps is rumored to be unable to determine who will be replacement midfielder Blaise Matuidi in the 2018 World Cup finals against Uruguay on Friday night. He still doubts whether to lower Corentin Tolisso or Nabil Fekir.

<center>![716748_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmccMV4E6hAjq1PY6UK7Hy7mJCxcbqcZeF3f8VpT8taw6R/716748_720.jpg)</center>

Both names, according to ESPN sources, became Matuidi's top replacement candidate. Tolisso can be considered a player of the same type as Matuidi. He is more defensive and has good fighting skills in the air.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

When France beat Argentina, Tolisso also replaced Matuidi in the second half. He also played 15 minutes in the opening match against Australia.

<center>![715742_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmemyPxkU1H4JX64vf7tjconkcKajubdBXEwTwdQ3hnefZ/715742_720.jpg)</center>

On the other hand, Deschmapns knows that Uruguay will play defensively and will not give France much room. For this problem, precisely Fekir is more suitable. Players Olympique Lyon has the ability to move in a very good narrow area. The vision of playing Fekir plus matured passes can also be a boon for France.

<center>![7.3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXJJrGqyxRRsEWay5iLtiB6Wv5fUV5pcNFK3nUHztPLJw/7.3.jpg)</center>

Deschamps are confusions that make the French players do not know who will play in tonight's game. He is rumored to only decide at the last moment to see the developments that occur from the stronghold of Uruguay.

author: saifulanwar
title: 2018 World Cup: Maradona Accuses England Playing Eyes with Referees
body:
<center>![7.9.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZ1oMfpPki8Hmw6VgCrmZFpR6C1dkXtCbJDFfA5R1RnMj/7.9.jpg)</center>

Hello everyone is a sports steemit lover, Diego Maradona provoked trouble because of his harsh criticism of the outcome of the 2018 World Cup final between Colombia and England. In a match that was held in Moscow on Wednesday morning, England won 4-3 on penalties after 90 minutes of matches ended 1-1.

<center>![l.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNr98CuoBhiCMXBefAqLygQwDnDksQB4KzDwPvderFEpo/l.jpg)</center>

Maradona said in the match, Britain carried out a massive ***robbery***  The legendary Argentine footballer added that there was a conspiracy with the referee from the United States, Mark Geiger, who led the game.

<center>![2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmP1StJGtzLbLqprATLEVsCtqNgcCc4CyJdAgAxw3SuMNh/2.jpg)</center>

**The main problem is the referee who leads the game. Who's that name? Mark Geiger? After I googling, he was an American. It's called a conspiracy, massive robbery,** Maradona said in a television talk show from Venezuela, Telesur.
From the eyes of Maradona, England should not get a penalty. Instead, it is Harry Kane who must be punished for violating Carlos Sanchez.

<center>![2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZsQ8abB3fsCf8DciCP9Fvxovg8CU13id91tiJnzKJbmk/2.jpg)</center>

***FIFA then reacted to Maradona's statement. The international soccer federation insists Maradona's sarcasm is very inappropriate***.FIFA also cited allegations regarding the conspiracy of Geiger's referee with England at all.

<center>![8.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmU1HT8Wdjk1gmoBmkcnsX9zoLWpztdQb7Aiu1JDbUKRpS/8.png)</center>

***FIFA issued a loud reprimand against comments that attacked match officials. We think they have shown a positive work in leading a high-powered game,*** the official FIFA statement said, responding to Maradona's allegations about the 2018 World Cup dispute.

![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)

title: The @Blocktrades World Cup 2018 Penalty Shot, England Will Win?
body:
<center>![19.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdE4zgRDMi6x6cyg7UeExRWH9FfDnJyE34QGifxrSXLiC/19.jpg)</center>


England finally managed to treat the wounded feeling they had lost on penalties for almost 30 years when they beat Colombia 4-3 on penalties in the last 16 of the 2018 World Cup in at the Spartak Stadium, Moscow, Russia.
Previously, Gareth Southgate care team is playing a 1-1 draw against Jose Pekerman's squad until the end of extra round.

<center>![17.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNLpskufop8Qqdw6KCWnURuYT1QktTU1xCFZhNNUuMBxt/17.jpg)</center>


During this England like a traumatic match if you have to undergo penalties. In the semi-finals of the 1990 World Cup in Italy, Paul Gascoigne, Gary Lineker, and comrades lost on penalties against West Germany. England then lost three times on penalties at the World Cup. They also lost on three of the four on penalties at the European Cup.
Coach Gareth Southgate, who suffered a penalty shootout failure when he became England's European Cup player, succeeded in drawing up a new generation of Three Lions teams deserved to win again after 1966.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

In the game, a new goal created through a penalty kick from Harry Kane in the 57th minute. Colombia was only able to reply to the goal in extra time through a header from the young defender, Yerry Mina, utilizing feedback from a corner kick. The game continued with an additional round.

<center>![1607905015.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcLf8NiPcUfGjaFjghwQzQEaVkJRML8PdtxvFrKewXMfE/1607905015.jpg)</center>

However, for 30 minutes extra round took place, both teams could not score a goal. Score is still a draw, the game was continued with a penalty shootout.
Radamel Falcao, who became the first executor for Colombia, managed to break down England goalkeeper guarded by Jordan Pickford. His success was also followed by two executor next, namely Juan Cuadrado and Luis Muriel.
But on the other hand, England should be left first, after Jordan Henderson, who became the third executor for the Three Lions squad, failed to break down the goalkeeper of Colombia escorted by David Ospina. After earlier, Kane and Marcus Rashford successfully penalize the penalty.

<center>![716398_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSL3WnwvCuWwYgQTby7Sma1wA9kNNMvJv1k3BxJnkKmYe/716398_720.jpg)</center>

Luckily for England, Henderson's failure was followed by Colombia's fourth executive, Mateus Uribe. While the fourth executor from England, Kieran Trippier, successfully penalty kick.
Asa Colombia was increasingly disappeared when the last executor, Carlos Bacca, also failed to execute his penalty. Finally, the British victory was closed by a penalty kick from Eric Dier. England also won the tosan-tosan contest with a score of 4-3.

For the victory, Britain is entitled to advance to the quarter-finals by facing Sweden on Saturday night, July 7 pm in Samara Arena, Russia.

<center>![Pixiz_20180625_165630_fyfm.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRfb3hSFQwG3i5vrcQECaUujyfnnHZ2foLrG1hE9UQxr6/Pixiz_20180625_165630_fyfm.png)</center>

# The composition of English players:
Pickford; Walker (Rashford 113 '), Stones, Maguire; Henderson, Trippier, Young (Rose 102 '), Lingard, Alli (Dier 81'); Sterling (Vardy 88 '), Kane

title: World Cup 2018: Nike likes opponents with Adidas | Cuartos de Final - Haz tu post para seguir concursando por 2,000 SBD en premios
body:
<center>![716118_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXxfZxabYFSwjnDzmxwQEhF1pxA5cayp9GZicSVZ8i4dw/716118_720.jpg)</center>
Hello everyone, Producer of Nike sports equipment to temporarily "beat" their rival, Adidas, at the 2018 World Cup. Nike sponsors Brazil, England and France who qualify for the quarterfinals. All three also occupy the top three are seeded today to win the 2018 World Cup.

<center>![716120_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWoZA5PxXiGTmRYr9vpfcEaxNSch79WNMnmbDvtR2Y3WJ/716120_720.jpg)</center>

The favored ranking situation for the 2018 World Cup champion, among others, was done by the official bookmaker, William Hill. In addition to them, the sports manufacturers from the United States also sponsored another quarter-final team, Croatia. German sports equipment maker Adidas sponsors Belgium, Russia and Sweden for the quarterfinals.Another team that went to the quarter-finals, Uruguay, was supported by another German sports manufacturer, Puma. On the other hand, Nike has now generated their worldwide sales of sports equipment products in excess of US $ 2 billion or around Rp 28 trillion in fiscal year 2018.

<center>![brasil.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmajmy6GTgbsxRTtYA1WckxLZupiAiJUXLyw9qXkzLtWv3/brasil.jpeg)</center>

"While Adidas dominates the European leagues and professional leagues of the United States, of course any market share that Nike can take in non-traditional American sports can be a good sign for pricing and stock brands," said Jake Dollarhide, CEO of Longbow Asset Management in Tulsa, Oklahoma.

<center>![l.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNr98CuoBhiCMXBefAqLygQwDnDksQB4KzDwPvderFEpo/l.jpg)</center>

Sports brand manufacturers usually sell most of their merchandise to their fans ahead of the World Cup. However, the success of the team in the field can result in additional demand for decorated and decorated gear from the winning costume. This, especially if the progress is unexpected.

<center>![r.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYbgwKUGb5x8sJzWeBTos5fcVJEiYN1h7GY28wihEZKVa/r.jpg)</center>

Nike is sponsoring more team fixtures than Adidas for the first time at the 2014 World Cup in Brazil. However, Adidas "hit" behind this year by sponsoring 12 of the 32 teams that participated in the 2018 World Cup, including defending champions Germany, Spain, and host Russia.But this tournament in Russia became difficult for Adidas after the 2014 World Cup champions, Germany, unexpectedly knocked out.

<center>![13.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbEGUXUvYVbY6tCz9xevtogkvNksZg2nEJu93PrprPBKm/13.jpg)</center>

However, the World Cup remains the biggest market opportunity for Adidas. They are one of seven partners of the world football body, FIFA, and have been suppliers of World Cup soccer since 1970.

body:
<center>![716461_720 (1).jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUAPSjTBzPWhfzurGpfKgY9FsVzXQqC5qpZF6bzdvDLns/716461_720%20(1).jpg)</center>

Hello all steemian lovers and fans of Russia's 2018 world cup, France coach Didier Deschamps prepared the best tactics to ensure Kylian Mbappe received plenty of bait in the 2018 World Cup quarter-final match against Uruguay.

<center>![p2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXn4jnfySnuPyfafbdqzZMXUSzBgQCbcVnNjyukzGPqRC/p2.jpg)</center>

Mbappe, 19, will be a major concern in the game later. The young player was already compared to Pele when he emerged as a factor X for France, having looked good and scored twice against Spain in the last 16. According to Deschamps, Mbappe needs to be given the opportunity to earn lots of balls if he wants to make an impact while playing at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.

<center>![p1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbbyo9Z42wHFze35RT5R2uSURU8RG4GEnRjpU9ufcMsWG/p1.jpg)</center>

The speed and sharpness of Mbappe has been the subject of talks at the World Cup. One observer's spotlight is how Deschamps can maximize Mbappe's role in a French-style front-liner with an attacking style.
Deschamps from the beginning understood the situation he was facing. "I can not complain that I have a player who can take an offensive position," Deschamps said earlier this year. "But I can make sure that they will be used in their best positions."

<center>![p3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcRN6fZFa2EHEmw1pNu45RTZQELSpsLtqcGrYPwbnPcnn/p3.jpg)</center>

Although many experts insist Mbappe is best used in the role of a classic center forward, Deschamps will likely play on the right side of the strike on Friday, giving Olivier Giroud a place to join Antoine Griezmann as the attacking trio.
France needed all the attacking talent they could muster, as it could damage Uruguay's defenses like "jackhammer" trying to open a new path.

<center>![p4.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaNidktyn63S7Y3T2JGErUFP9pKEMwBhqdw4Wir9HCcVq/p4.jpg)</center>

The South American team have recorded matches without conceding in six of their previous seven matches with team-mates Diego Godin and Jose Gimenez as the original wall.
Uruguay's game plan is well known. Make your defense as strong as possible for your opponent and when you get the ball, go straight to Edinson Cavani or Luis Suarez.

<center></center>

Unless, the plan can be very disturbed if Cavani does not recover from a calf injury and failed to appear on Friday.
Uruguay did the exercises earlier this week for a number of options, with Cristhian Stuani likely to play sideways and Cristian Rodriguez was asked to offer more support to Suarez, who tried to hide his weakness when Cavani missed a chance.

<center>![p5.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZMroLXqajbZ8SnynHjrTTdWmkhjD3iUGNAgo9nZim7Yt/p5.jpg)</center>

"It does not depend on the one player shown by Uruguay that we are dependent on collective work in the field.

<center>![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)</center>

author: saifulanwar
title: The @Blocktrades World Cup -  last 8 | Brazil Vs Belgium: Kompany Talks About Gold and Neymar Generation
body:
<center>![710020_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPWJ6svUX1X14ihhG9myuT6mKzjoPytJ5DtyppyAPHbbo/710020_720.jpg)</center>

Belgium defender Vincent Kompany said Wednesday that the 2018 World Cup quarter-final match against Brazil, in Kazan on Friday, was the decisive game for his team. He also insisted that the "gold generation" label affixed to his team would have no effect.

<center>![715115_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYtvPzHagt3NfUUtaUCEViJF3sMZEmv8GXeRZttAnN76Q/715115_720.jpg)</center>

"The term 'golden generation' is definitely not a term found by any of the players and it is not something that is so important to us," he said during a military exercise in Moscow.
Kompany, "The fact that the game against Brazil is decisive for our generation is uncertain, although it is not like we failed until now but there is a level above, which we need to achieve, which can be done by games like we play against Brazil.

<center>![brasil.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmajmy6GTgbsxRTtYA1WckxLZupiAiJUXLyw9qXkzLtWv3/brasil.jpeg)</center>

He said the game would be decisive, also for Brazil. "So this is a decisive game, but not just for us it is a decisive game for Brazil as well, their players have" both teams deserve to face each other deeper, in this tournament and not in the quarterfinals.
The "Golden Generation" label has been attached to Kompany and Belgian players, including Kevin De Bruyne, Eden Hazard, Thibault Courtois, and Dries Mertens, for many years. So far they have not been able to excel and were eliminated in the final round of World Cup 2014 and European Championships in France two years ago.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

Kompany says they are mentally tougher, especially as members of the squad have won at club level across Europe. "It used to be in Belgian culture, and I think people will agree with me, we will try even before a match like this, but all the players in our team, who play in clubs around the world, now believe 100 percent we can beat Brazil. 
Is that realistic enough? "I do not know, Brazil is a great team but there is no day when I sit thinking 'what if we lose'?" he says.

<center>![716120_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWoZA5PxXiGTmRYr9vpfcEaxNSch79WNMnmbDvtR2Y3WJ/716120_720.jpg)</center>

Kompany asked about the action Neymar often overreact when violated opponents. What will Belgium do?
"I do not know, I do not care," said Manchester City defender. "If it's going to be an individual reality game and that's it then you will lose us now also have no chance against Brazil but if it will be the collective look of a team that knows how to play together and fight for each other, then we have and one thing that can be done.Whatever players in other teams will not be much danger. 

<center></center>
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)

title: Uruguay Vs France, Deschamps Galau Define Successor Matuidi
body:
<center>![p3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcRN6fZFa2EHEmw1pNu45RTZQELSpsLtqcGrYPwbnPcnn/p3.jpg)</center>

Hello everyone, France coach Didier Deschamps is rumored to be unable to determine who will be replacement midfielder Blaise Matuidi in the 2018 World Cup finals against Uruguay on Friday night. He still doubts whether to lower Corentin Tolisso or Nabil Fekir.

<center>![716748_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmccMV4E6hAjq1PY6UK7Hy7mJCxcbqcZeF3f8VpT8taw6R/716748_720.jpg)</center>

Both names, according to ESPN sources, became Matuidi's top replacement candidate. Tolisso can be considered a player of the same type as Matuidi. He is more defensive and has good fighting skills in the air.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

When France beat Argentina, Tolisso also replaced Matuidi in the second half. He also played 15 minutes in the opening match against Australia.

<center>![715742_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmemyPxkU1H4JX64vf7tjconkcKajubdBXEwTwdQ3hnefZ/715742_720.jpg)</center>

On the other hand, Deschmapns knows that Uruguay will play defensively and will not give France much room. For this problem, precisely Fekir is more suitable. Players Olympique Lyon has the ability to move in a very good narrow area. The vision of playing Fekir plus matured passes can also be a boon for France.

<center>![7.3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXJJrGqyxRRsEWay5iLtiB6Wv5fUV5pcNFK3nUHztPLJw/7.3.jpg)</center>

Deschamps are confusions that make the French players do not know who will play in tonight's game. He is rumored to only decide at the last moment to see the developments that occur from the stronghold of Uruguay.

author: saifulanwar
title: 2018 World Cup: Maradona Accuses England Playing Eyes with Referees
body:
<center>![7.9.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZ1oMfpPki8Hmw6VgCrmZFpR6C1dkXtCbJDFfA5R1RnMj/7.9.jpg)</center>

Hello everyone is a sports steemit lover, Diego Maradona provoked trouble because of his harsh criticism of the outcome of the 2018 World Cup final between Colombia and England. In a match that was held in Moscow on Wednesday morning, England won 4-3 on penalties after 90 minutes of matches ended 1-1.

<center>![l.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNr98CuoBhiCMXBefAqLygQwDnDksQB4KzDwPvderFEpo/l.jpg)</center>

Maradona said in the match, Britain carried out a massive ***robbery***  The legendary Argentine footballer added that there was a conspiracy with the referee from the United States, Mark Geiger, who led the game.

<center>![2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmP1StJGtzLbLqprATLEVsCtqNgcCc4CyJdAgAxw3SuMNh/2.jpg)</center>

**The main problem is the referee who leads the game. Who's that name? Mark Geiger? After I googling, he was an American. It's called a conspiracy, massive robbery,** Maradona said in a television talk show from Venezuela, Telesur.
From the eyes of Maradona, England should not get a penalty. Instead, it is Harry Kane who must be punished for violating Carlos Sanchez.

<center>![2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZsQ8abB3fsCf8DciCP9Fvxovg8CU13id91tiJnzKJbmk/2.jpg)</center>

***FIFA then reacted to Maradona's statement. The international soccer federation insists Maradona's sarcasm is very inappropriate***.FIFA also cited allegations regarding the conspiracy of Geiger's referee with England at all.

<center>![8.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmU1HT8Wdjk1gmoBmkcnsX9zoLWpztdQb7Aiu1JDbUKRpS/8.png)</center>

***FIFA issued a loud reprimand against comments that attacked match officials. We think they have shown a positive work in leading a high-powered game,*** the official FIFA statement said, responding to Maradona's allegations about the 2018 World Cup dispute.

![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)
